subject: Dear Beneficiary, My name is M
body:
Dear Beneficiary, My name is Mr. Jordan Strong Executive Payment Director of RBC (Royal Bank Of Canada) Toronto, Canada. I'm contacting you on behalf of your authorization regarding your allocated funds US$26million (Twenty Six Million USA Dollars) 
Our bank was notified by a source claiming to be your next of kin, the rightful beneficiary to your unclaimed funds before any procedure could commence I need to hear from you as soon as possible to be sure this is a false claim so the imposter could be apprehended immediately.
An urgent response is needed from you within the next 42hrs, before the bank could take any action.
Yours sincerely.
Jordan Strong 
Executive Payment Director 
RBC (Royal Bank Of Canada) 
Toronto, Canada.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary, My name is M
body:
Hello Mr. Jordan Strong,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this unclaimed fund of US Twenty Six Million Dollars. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in connection with these funds?

Also, could you clarify who is claiming to be my next of kin? I would like to understand the situation better before we proceed further.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary, My name is M
body:
I will explain all details but now I need you to forward me your full
information for verification here at the bank.

Soon as your information has been verified the imposter claiming to be your
next of kin will be arrested.

1. Full Name
2. Phone Number
3. Banking Details
4. Home Address
5. ID card.

Jordan Strong.

You will be receiving your funds in 2 options so I need you to make your
choice on how you want to receive your funds either by wire transfer or
bitcoin (CRYPTO CURRENCY)

So make your choice and get back to me immediately to proceed.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary, My name is M
body:
Hello Jordan Strong,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really interested in learning more about this situation. It's quite surprising to hear that someone is claiming to be my next of kin.

Could you please explain a bit more about how this came to light? And what steps are being taken by the bank to address this issue?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re:
body:
Hello Jordan Strong,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about these options! I'm not very familiar with bitcoin CRYPTO CURRENCY, could you please explain a bit more about it? And as for the wire transfer, how does that work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Your full withheld funds has been officially approved by the IMF to be
transferred to you through our bank here in Canada.

The Bank has notified the security agency about the imposter and will take
action immediately to see that the imposter claiming to be your next of kin
is apprehended.

Jordan Strong.

subject: FUNDS TO BE TRANSFERRED $26MILLION
body:
Very well I understand you are not familiar with bitcoin.

For the wire transfer option you need to send in your banking details for
processing to enable your funds to be transferred into your account within
24hrs.

Send in your banking details, ID card & Phone number.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: FUNDS TO BE TRANSFERRED $26MILLION
body:
Hello Jordan Strong,

Thank you for your message. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with bitcoin or wire transfers. Could you please explain a bit more about how these processes work? 

I'm also curious, why do you need my banking details and ID card? Is there another way to process the funds without sharing such personal information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite surprising to hear about someone claiming to be my next of kin. Could you please tell me more about how the IMF got involved in this matter? And what kind of actions are being taken against this imposter, Jordan Strong?

I'm also curious about the process of transferring these funds. How does it usually work? I'd appreciate any additional details you could provide.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re: FUNDS TO BE TRANSFERRED $26MILLION
body:
Madam, There's no other way the funds could be transferred unless an
account will be opened for you here at the bank and deposited your
funds into your opened account then you'll be delivered a special
Mastercard ATM card you can use to make withdrawal anywhere in the world.

So you choice and get back to me now.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Madam, the wire transfer is a Telegraphic Transfer (KTT) which you have to
provide the bank your banking details you'll use to receive your funds
which will be transferred within 48hrs.

I wait to hear from you.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: FUNDS TO BE TRANSFERRED $26MILLION
body:

Could you please explain more about how this process works? For instance, how would I go about opening an account at your bank? And once the account is opened, how long does it usually take for the funds to be deposited?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:

wiring a desired amount of funds legally and secured within 48hrs.

Below is the information needed for the transfer.

1. Full Name
2. Full Address
3. Phone Number
4.SSN
5.ID Card

I wait to hear from you.

Jordan Strong.

body:

5. ID card

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Madam, all you need to know is that once you provide your banking details
the transfer process will take place and which the IMF clearance documents
needs to be obtained in order for the transfer commence immediately.

To obtain the IMF clearance certificate the total cost is $1,200.00 to
backup the transfer.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
The transfer will be a direct telegraphic bank wire transfer into your bank
account within 48hrs or less depending on the when the transfer commences.

body:

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.

Jordan Strong.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Madam, the fee is only the payment you are to make in order to obtain the
IMF clearance certificate "Certificate of International Capital transfer" the
document is used for approval to backup the transfer so your funds can be
wired safely into your account without any stoppage.

So you need to try and send in your bank information for processing so that
the transfer will commence immediately the Certificate is issued.

Jordan Strong.

body:

Jordan Strong.
